'''v0.3.0 alpha''' is a major update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on April 23, 2012 and April 24, 2012.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20120504163040/http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id479516143?mt=8</ref><ref>http://web.archive.org/web/20120427014353/https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe</ref> It adds notable features, such as [[crafting]], new [[mobs]], [[blocks]], [[items]], and [[tools]] as well as other changes and fixes.<ref>{{link|url=https://www.mojang.com/2012/04/minecraft-pocket-edition-now-with-crafting/|title=Minecraft - ''Pocket Edition'' Now with Crafting!|archive-url=http://web.archive.org/web/20191004200200/https://www.mojang.com/2012/04/minecraft-pocket-edition-now-with-crafting/|website=mojang.com|date=April 24, 2012}}</ref>

This version was not playable, as the pre-reupload had a bug where it caused a crash upon launch. This was fixed in the first reupload. It was later reuploaded again that day to add more inventory space and a smaller GUI as well fixing an icon bug.

=== Gameplay ===
* New [[sounds|sound effects]]
* New [[inventory]]
'''[[Crafting]]'''
[[File:Old MATTIS inventory.png|thumb|250px|in-game screenshot of old MATTIS in the inventory (without crafting table).]]<br>[[File:Old MATTIS.png|thumb|250px|In-game screenshot of the old MATTIS crafting system.]]
* How the player makes blocks and items.
* Crafting menu can be accessed by either tapping the "Craft" button on the upper-left of the inventory, or by tapping on a crafting table.
* {{Version exclusive}}: uses the ''Minecraft'' Advanced Touch Technology Interface System (MATTIS) crafting system.
'''[[Durability]]'''
* Most [[tool]]s, excluding [[shears]], now have a limited number of uses based on their [[tier]].
** Wooden tools have 11 uses, and stone tools have 132 uses.
** For most tools, breaking any block counts as 1 use.
*** For swords, this counts as 2 uses.
** Hitting a mob currently counts as 0 uses.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Survival]]'''
* All items now need to be gathered, except [[shears]], [[bricks]], and [[glass]].
* The player no longer starts out with the following items in infinite stacks:
** [[Stone shovel]]
** [[Stone pickaxe]]
** [[Stone axe]]
** [[Stone sword]]
** [[Ladder]]
** [[Torch]]
** [[Wooden door]]
** [[Fence]]
** [[Fence gate]]
** [[Wooden plank]]s
** [[Wooden stairs]]
** [[Cobblestone stairs]]
** [[Stone slab]]
** 13 of the 16 colored [[wool]] blocks (excluding white, magenta, and orange)
** [[Leaves]]
** [[Bookshelves]]
* Survival inventory
** The inventory slots has been reduced from 45 to 36.
** Items that have to be gathered are no longer shown in the inventory if the player does not have any of the item.
** Items not in an infinite stack can be thrown by the player and removed from their inventory by tapping and holding on the hotbar slot of the item they want to throw for two seconds.
'''[[Creative inventory]] '''
* Additions:
** [[Brick stairs]]
** [[Wooden slab]]
** [[Brick slab]]
** [[Orange wool]]
** [[Magenta wool]]
** [[Crafting table]]
